ProductInfo.Features:
Sixfold operation: Live recording, Playback, Backup, Remote access, PTZ control, Mobile monitoring
Support Window Mobile, Symbian, Android, iPhone and Blackberry etc
1 SATA port, the capacity of single hard disk MAX 2T, 1 RJ-45 10/100Mbps Ethernet connector
4 CH  BNC input, 1CH TV Output ,1CH  VGA Output, RS485 Port, Support PELCO-D,PELCO-P Procotol
Vandalproof IR Dome Camera 24 pcs dia.5mm IR LED, IR Distance 20M, Al-Alloy Case,IP66. Built-in 3.6 mm Board Lens (6mm is optional)
ProductInfo.Name: V-See Security Camera System- 4CH H.264 CCTV Surveillance Network DVR + 4 Outdoor Waterproof Dome Security Camera System
